trans-unit.source: Displays a collection of child activity designers in a preview strip and, when a child designer is selected on the preview strip, displays the selected activity designer in preview or edit mode on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Visar en uppsättning underordnade aktivitetsdesigners i en förhandsgranskningsvy och när en underordnad designer markeras på förhandsgranskningsvyn visar den valda Aktivitetsdesigner i Förhandsgranska eller redigera läge i ett arbetsflöde designytan.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityPreviewDesigner is a sequential activity designer that displays all of its child activity designers in a strip that appears at the top of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ActivityPreviewDesigner är en sekventiell Aktivitetsdesigner som visar alla dess underordnade aktivitetsdesigners i en lista som visas överst i dess designytan.

trans-unit.source: When one of the child designers is selected, its representation is displayed in a preview window that the activity preview designer hosts below the strip.
trans-unit.target: När du har valt en underordnad Designer visas dess representation i en förhandsgranskningsfönstret att förhandsgranska Aktivitetsdesigner värd under remsan.

trans-unit.source: The ActivityPreviewDesigner has a preview mode and an edit mode.
trans-unit.target: ActivityPreviewDesigner har inget förhandsgranskningsläge och en redigeringsläget.

trans-unit.source: Preview mode allows the user to view the entire representation of the selected designer without scrolling; however, preview mode does not allow the user to modify the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Förhandsgranskningsläge tillåter användare att visa hela representation av den valda designern utan att rulla; förhandsgranskningsläge tillåter dock inte användaren att ändra den markerade Aktivitetsdesigner.

trans-unit.source: Edit mode allows the user to modify the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Redigeringsläge låter användaren att ändra den valda aktivitet designern.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the designer to adjust its UI for users with disabilities.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> som gör det möjligt att justera sitt användargränssnitt för användare med funktionshinder.

trans-unit.source: If the initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> creates an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.
trans-unit.target: Om det första värdet i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>är en null-referens (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>skapas en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> to adjust its UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> som gör att den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> justera sitt användargränssnitt för användare som har försämringar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of activity designers that are displayed by the activity preview designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling aktivitetsdesigners som visas i förhandsgranskningen Aktivitetsdesigner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> read-only collection that contains the designers displayed by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> skrivskyddad samling som innehåller de designers som visas av <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger index för aktuella målet i matrisen med släpp mål som returneras av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets*>

trans-unit.source: The CurrentDropTarget set operation sets the target in the preview strip that appears at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Set-åtgärd CurrentDropTarget anger målet i förhandsgranskningsvy som visas överst i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Ett heltal som representerar indexet för aktuella målet för designer.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Släpper de ohanterade resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> och släpper du de hantera resurserna.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release the managed resources; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att släppa hanterade resurser. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Gör att den angivna Aktivitetsdesigner visas i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner verifies that all activity designers in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, and their children, are displayed in the preview strip at the top of the designer.
trans-unit.target: EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner verifierar att alla aktivitetsdesigners i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, och deras underordnade visas i förhandsgranskningsvy överst i designern.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> som du vill kontrollera synlighet i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinnehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det första valbara objektet navigering efter den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> do not contain null references (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), FirstSelectableObject will return the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A>inte innehåller nullreferenser (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), FirstSelectableObject returnerar värdet för <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A>egenskapen i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property contains a null reference (`Nothing`), FirstSelectableObject will return the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A>-egenskapen innehåller en null-referens (`Nothing`), FirstSelectableObject returneras den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>som är associerade med den första designern i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>samling.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som är det första valbara objektet i ordningen som designer navigering.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en matris med rektanglar som bunden den Aktivitetsdesigner kopplingar.

trans-unit.source: GetConnectors returns an empty array if one or more of the following conditions occur: - The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is not the active designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: GetConnectors returnerar en tom matris om en eller flera av följande villkor inträffar: – <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>är inte aktiv designer i designvyn i arbetsflödet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> does not contain any child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>Inte innehåller några underordnade Aktivitetsdesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is not expanded on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>Inte visas i designvyn i arbetsflödet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is set to `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that defines the bounds of all connectors in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matris som definierar gränserna för alla kopplingar i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en matris med rektanglar som representerar giltig släpp platser inom den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If `dropPoint` is in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> preview strip, GetDropTargets returns the possible drop targets in the strip.
trans-unit.target: Om `dropPoint` i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>förhandsgranskningsvy, GetDropTargets returnerar möjliga släpp-mål i remsan.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som definierar de x - och y-koordinaterna för målet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matris som representerar giltig släpp platser inom den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar det första valbara objektet som följer det angivna objektet i ordningen som navigering i aktuellt <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Since users can only navigate horizontally in the preview pane of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, GetNextSelectableObject only recognizes <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom användare kan bara navigera vågrätt i förhandsgranskningsfönstret <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>GetNextSelectableObject bara kan identifiera <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection>och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Det aktuella objektet i ordningen som navigering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the direction in which designer navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> uppräkningsvärde som anger riktning i vilken designer navigering inträffar.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follow obj in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Först valbar fram obj i ordningen som navigering.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en skrivskyddad samling av tecken som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Glyphs contains the collection of glyphs to display in the preview strip at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Specialtecken innehåller samlingen av tecken som ska visas i förhandsgranskningsvy längst upp i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"></xref> read-only collection that contains the glyphs associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"> </xref> skrivskyddad samling som innehåller tecken som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> contains no other activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger texten som ska visas när den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> innehåller inga andra aktivitetsdesigners.

trans-unit.source: The HelpText set operation adds text to the preview strip at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Set-åtgärd hjälptext lägger till text på förhandsgranskningsvy längst upp i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface
trans-unit.target: En sträng som innehåller texten som ska visas på designytan

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar information om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> vid de angivna koordinaterna i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som innehåller koordinater i designytan arbetsflöde som du vill samla in information från.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> som innehåller information om den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> på angivna koordinater

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer used by the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Initierar designer som används av den angivna aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: This sets up listening to the selection change event for the activity designer associated with `activity`.
trans-unit.target: Då konfigureras lyssnar på Ändringshändelse val för Aktivitetsdesigner som är associerade med `activity`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> for which to initialize the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som du vill initiera designern.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activity designer is visible in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om den angivna Aktivitetsdesigner är synlig i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is `true` and the preview window is set to preview mode, IsContainedDesignerVisible returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>är `true` och förhandsgranskningsfönstret har angetts till Förhandsgranska läge IsContainedDesignerVisible returnerar `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> att kontrollera.

trans-unit.source: if containedDesigner is visible; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if containedDesigner is visible; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignerinnehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det sista objektet i valbar navigering efter den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> do not contain null references (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject returns the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A>inte innehåller nullreferenser (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject returnerar värdet för <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A>egenskapen i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the last designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>innehåller en null-referens (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject returnerar den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>som är associerade med den senaste designern i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>samling.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som är valbara objektet i ordningen som designer navigering.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Läser in för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> från en binär dataström.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to restore the designer view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>används för att återställa designer visningsstatus.</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: reader contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: readerinnehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: The designer host associated with the designer is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Designer värden som associeras med designern är en null-referens (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the designer in logical coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger platsen för designern i logiska koordinater i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: The Location set operation updates the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> and all child designers it contains.
trans-unit.target: Set-åtgärd plats uppdaterar platsen för den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>och alla underordnade designers som den innehåller.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the x- and y-coordinates associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som innehåller x - och y-koordinater som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> i designvyn i arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer that the number of activities contained in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar designern antalet aktiviteter som finns i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: `listChangeArgs` contains the activity designers that have been added and removed from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: `listChangeArgs`innehåller aktivitetsdesigners som har lagts till och tas bort från <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: OnContainedActivitiesChanged updates the designer verbs associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> and modifies the designer layout on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: OnContainedActivitiesChanged uppdaterar designer verb som är associerade med den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>och ändrar designeryta på arbetsflödet designytan.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: listChangeArgs contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: listChangeArgsinnehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> när en dra släpp-åtgärd pågår och användarens markören anger designern gränser.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: einnehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> när en dra släpp-åtgärd pågår och användarens muspekaren är innanför kontrollens gränser designern.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: einnehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Utför layoutuppgifter om du vill placera visuell information och underordnad Designer på den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: einnehåller en null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anger storleken på de visuella tips om designers som ingår i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: OnLayoutSize determines the size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> preview strip that displays the collection of child activity designers and the preview window that displays the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: OnLayoutSize bestämmer storleken på den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>Förhandsgranska remsa som visar mängden med underordnade aktivitetsdesigners och förhandsgranskningsfönstret som visar den valda Aktivitetsdesigner.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: OnLayoutSize also determines the size of the preview window depending on whether the designer is in edit or preview mode.
trans-unit.target: OnLayoutSize avgör också storleken på förhandsgranskningsfönstret beroende på om designern är i läget Redigera eller förhandsgranskning.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> returns `false`, OnLayoutSize returns the base implementation inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>returnerar `false`, OnLayoutSize returnerar Basimplementationen ärvs från <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> som innehåller de nya storleksinställningarna för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when the user double-clicks on the surface of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> när användaren dubbelklickar på Aktivitetsdesigner yta.

trans-unit.source: When the user double-clicks in the preview window OnMouseDoubleClick enables edit mode on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: När användaren dubbelklickar i förhandsgranskningsfönstret OnMouseDoubleClick aktiverar redigeringsläge <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when the user presses the mouse button down while the pointer is in designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> när användaren trycker ned musknappen ned när pekaren är i designern gränser.

trans-unit.source: If the user presses the mouse button down while the cursor is in the preview window, edit mode is turned on for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Om användaren trycker ned musknappen när markören är i förhandsgranskningsfönstret redigeringsläge är aktiverat för designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the user moves the mouse cursor out of designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar designern när användaren flyttar markören utanför designer intervallet.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the user releases the mouse button in the designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar designern när användaren släpper musknappen i designern gränser.

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the mouse button over the preview strip, the scrollable button changes to a minimum scroll arrow.
trans-unit.target: När användaren släpper musknappen över förhandsgranskningsvy minsta rullningspilarna nedrullningsbar knapp ändringarna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Ritar en visuell representation av aktiviteten som associeras med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> i designläge.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller informationen om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Meddelar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> som dess associerade temat har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: OnThemeChange not only updates the theme property settings for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, it also renders the new settings to the preview window.
trans-unit.target: OnThemeChange inte bara uppdaterar temat egenskapsinställningar för <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, visas också med de nya inställningarna till förhandsgranskningsfönstret.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> som innehåller uppdaterade tema egenskapsinställningar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer to preview in the preview section of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar designer för förhandsgranskning i avsnittet Förhandsgranska i aktiviteten Designer.

trans-unit.source: If no designer is selected in the preview strip section of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, PreviewedDesigner returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Om ingen designer är markerad i avsnittet Förhandsgranska remsa av den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, PreviewedDesigner returnerar en null-referens (`Nothing` i Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display in the preview section of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> ska visas i avsnittet Förhandsgranska den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Updates the configuration errors associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uppdaterar konfigurationsfel som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: RefreshDesignerActions not only updates the actions associated with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, it also renders the new views to the preview window.
trans-unit.target: RefreshDesignerActions uppdateras inte bara de åtgärder som är associerade med <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, visas också med de nya vyerna till förhandsgranskningsfönstret.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Updates the view displayed in the preview window of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uppdaterar den vy som visas i förhandsgranskningsfönstret av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> must be set to `true` for RefreshPreview to perform view updates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>måste anges till `true` för RefreshPreview att utföra Visa uppdateringar.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stores the current view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Lagrar aktuellt visningsläge den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> till en binär dataström.

trans-unit.source: SaveViewState saves the currently selected activity designer in the preview strip and, if <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> returns `true`, the contents of the preview window.
trans-unit.target: SaveViewState sparar markerade Aktivitetsdesigner i förhandsgranskningsvy och om <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>returnerar `true`, innehållet i förhandsgranskningsfönstret.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> to which the current designer view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>till designer visa aktuell status är lagrad.</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: writer contains null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: writerinnehåller null-referens ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the activity preview should be displayed in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om förhandsversionen av aktivitet ska visas i designern.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the activity preview in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Visa aktiviteten Förhandsgranska i den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of verbs to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar mängden verb ska associeras med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection"></xref> that contains the verbs associated with <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection"> </xref> som innehåller de verb som är associerade med <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.
